verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] cancelled his historic summit with Kim Jong Un after North Korea threatened a " nuclear showdown " with the U.S.
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: cancelled] [ARG1: his historic summit with Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: after North Korea threatened a " nuclear showdown " with the U.S.]
